name: Krepost
short_description:
Krepost: a secure MVC framework written in PHP
==============================================

Prerequisites:

- PHP 5.x
- Apache Web Server
- MySQL Database Server

The Krepost codebase is focussed on the following:

- Performance
- Availability
- Security
- Scalability
- Maintenance
- Extensibility

It provides the following features:

- Licensed Under GPLv3
- Fully XHTML Standard Compliant
- Fully CSS Standard Compliant
- HTTP Session, and Session Data protection
- User Accounts' protection
- Secure User Authentication
summary: Krepost is a secure MVC framework written in PHP
